website_summaries.verdict: The type of mechanical beam scale to buy for home use with user-friendly features.
pros: Comes with a 400 pound capacity without the need for extra counterweights
Dual side markings on the scale allow others to read the scale's results
cons: Initial assembly can be difficult for first time users new to mechanical beam scales

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice, but cannot assemble
customer_reviews.text: Scale arrived quickly. It was nicely packed. I unpacked it. It appears undamaged. I layed out onto the floor the three major pieces and a packet of 6-bolts and 6-washers. No assembly and setup instructions were included. No warranty was included. No maintenance instruction were included. No seller contact information was included. I should be able to get it aseembled, and see some helpful hints among the Reviewers’ comments.
customer_reviews.author: William Lewis Angus

customer_reviews.title: After hiring two workmen to assemble, neither could complete assembly despite best efforts!
customer_reviews.text: After hiring two workmen to assemble, neither could complete assembly despite best efforts! Neither could I (simply not strong enough as smaller female to even hold parts in place long enough to assemble. Sadly, plenty of money spent...but had to get help carrying it to curb... Too heavy for me to even manage to transport to Goodwill to donate! Sheesh... 💁🏻‍♀️(Researched most accurate, reliable, simple, 12”x12” digital floor scale online, bought for approx $15-20 delivered, & accuracy matches scale at Dr.’s ofc... confirmed for nearly 9months now! (Of weighing on simple $20 scale on same day of my monthly visits to doctor!)
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Smith

customer_reviews.title: Its a great buy if you really want to know your exact weight..No guessing
customer_reviews.text: It went together easy..Just make sure you lay in on its back on a counter so you can connect the hook to the base. It gets a little tricky but you can do it. My electronic floor scale always moved up and down and I was sick of it. Nothing beats a simple mech scale. It was easy to calibrate. You will have this scale for years. Amazon sent it out quickly and save me 50 dollars shipping from a hospital equipment place. If you want to know for sure what your weight is buy this scale
customer_reviews.author: Norm McIntosh

customer_reviews.title: Great Scale
customer_reviews.text: Love this scale and find it to be extremely accurate. Was a breeze to assemble except for hooking the upper and lower together. Once I started to use a zip tie around the hook, from the upper post, to pull the hook to the lever on the lower platform, it only took a couple of minutes. Lots of folks don't seem to understand the balance beam portion of the weighing mechanism, you have to be still on the platform and use small movements if the weights. Once you understand that, you've mastered how to use this scale without any electricity .
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Trust the readings and life expectancy
customer_reviews.text: Was tired of buying these dang scales.I was able to put this together easily and I know it will never need electrical power (batteries). I had a different pressure/spring scale that was never accurate. This one has a screw on the left side of the balance beam where slight turns really fine tune the scale. I trust the readings and I expect this to last until I am dust. Now if I could just get a vacuum cleaner with the same quality.
customer_reviews.author: Mark C. Harding

customer_reviews.title: The only complaint I have about these scales is the ...
customer_reviews.text: The only complaint I have about these scales is the "needle" doesn't appear to float very freely. However I have checked the scales against others and that does NOT affect the reading. It does read accurately and the needle does end up in the middle. Its just that the movement has a somewhat "viscous" motion. Again, not really a complaint. I would buy these scales again in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: BobbyC

customer_reviews.title: Great old-school doctor's office type scale
customer_reviews.text: Digital bathroom scales have been unreliable and inaccurate for our needs. This doctor's office scale works well and is reliably accurate. No battery required. Although it takes up more space than spiffy digital models, it does the job and sacrificing a little floor space is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: R. Tabata

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, easy to use, American made.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, easy to use, I am happy I bought it. This scale reads to a quarter of a pound, and I have been weighing myself a couple of times a day to see how my weight varies during the day. Also, I can track as I endeavor to loose a little weight. I keep a notebook next to the scale and record the date, time, and weight. I now understand better that body weight is not a single number, but varies by as much as 3 or more pounds during the day. I'll report back in a bit and let you know if it worked in my weight-loss plan.
customer_reviews.author: Alyosha

customer_reviews.title: Everything that you need for assembly
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in good shape. The instruction sheet was folded perfectly so that the spots I most needed to see were obliterated but still not too difficult to assemble. The instructions did explain how to use the "provided" hex head screws for assembly. And they provided a convenient wrench for them: Only problem was, they weren't hex head screws, they were Phillips head: So I used my screwdriver. :)
customer_reviews.author: Six Point Calvinist

customer_reviews.title: Need to read instructions
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be cheaply made. Was confused with instructions because a few pieces came off the bottom of scale during delivery. Had to examine the instructions and replace a few pieces from the bottom of the scale. Also, missing two screws from the poise and called Detecto to replace them. The poise was suppose to be on the scale but it wasn't. Other than that, it seems to be accurate.
customer_reviews.author: YoYo Zit

customer_reviews.title: What I'd hoped for
customer_reviews.text: Did a lot of research and settled on this one based on the reviews. It was easy to assemble and took no more than a few minutes. Initially I was pretty unhappy as simply shifting weight between legs made a vast difference and it was very difficult to center. After discovering a large "S" hook that was extra, I determined after a little inspection that it was part of the mechanism. Not sure how it could have come off, but it obviously did. Anyway, it now works perfectly and I'm very happy with the purchase. The numbers are large enough to read easily and it works just like you think it should.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Detecto
customer_reviews.text: Came faster than posted delevery day, got just befor my DR viset and it was right on target. Only one con thats hooking the hook from the weights to the base but I figured out an easy way. I took a long wire tie like used on trash bags wraped one end, around hook then placed the top onto base making sure, that tie went threw the center hole. Then finger tight the 6 screws so can move top n base, place as instruction on a table, now grab the tie pull till hook catches undo tie at the hook tighten screws set balance weights done injoy
customer_reviews.author: readyk

customer_reviews.title: Best scale ever.
customer_reviews.text: Got fed up with unreliable digital scales, so I finally bit the bullet and bought this beauty after using them at my doctors' offices forever. Only took around ten minutes to put it together and calibrate the zero, no problems at all. We have had it for several months now, and it remains rock solid. Easy to set up, and easy to read. The height measure is a plus if you want to keep track of that too. Well worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Coop

customer_reviews.title: I like the fact that the scale was made in America
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that the scale was made in America. It seems to be in excellent condition and seems to work fine. It does require a phillips-head screwdriver to assemble. Fortunately I have one. I suppose most households do. It also required a side clipper to cut the tough plastic strap which held in place the protective covering over the sliding weights. This scale replaces an electronic one that didn't always give exactly the right weight. It just arrived today and I just got it set up, so I cannot speak of its durability, but it appears solid.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel1948

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have wanted one of these scales forever! It is wonderful to know that I will probably have this scale for life. It was worth the investment(and its American made!). I Get on the scale and can be assured that the numbers are correct(just like at the doctor's office). The assemble was not hard(for a 68yr old). Make sure you measure the space you plan to put it. I didn't, I went by sight and it's a little too big for my bathroom. I have another place in mind for it.
customer_reviews.author: BukiTee

customer_reviews.title: But once correctly assembled works like a champ
customer_reviews.text: It had become dissembled in transit and was quite confusing to figure out how to get the part lying in the bottom of the box back into place. Cost me 5 avocados for a neighbor to decipher after i gave up on it. Assembly directions could be a whole lot clearer. But once correctly assembled works like a champ, should last me forever. Worth what it cost.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Seneca

customer_reviews.title: This is a great scale and very accurate
customer_reviews.text: This is a great scale and very accurate, easy to operate. I was a little scared at first because of the reviews I had read about it being hard to hook the rod from the top to the foot platform. The was the easiest part of the whole assembly, it took me about thirty five or forty seconds. For anyone looking for a good accurate scale I can sure recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle L. Cole

customer_reviews.title: Just like the doctor's office (before digital).
customer_reviews.text: I have already reviewed this once, but again I really like it. I have to put my glasses on to read my weight, but other than that, it is really good. I don't trust the height measurement as it appears to be off by about an inch from the doctors office and I see no way to adjust it. However, I did not buy it for the height measurement, I bought it for weighing myself, and for this it does an outstanding job. I just hope that I don't have to keep on reviewing this product. Twice is enough.
customer_reviews.author: Ski Gorski

customer_reviews.title: nice scale, but....
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice scale, accurate and easy to use. I paid a premium for it because the ad made it clear it measured kilograms, but the scale that arrived was pounds only. I can divide by 2.2 each morning, which is what I do, so it's quite useful. By the time I realized it wasn't what I wanted, my friend had already assembled it and thrown away the boxes.
customer_reviews.author: The Adam

customer_reviews.title: Finally I know my True weight
customer_reviews.text: I had an electronic scale that never matched my weight at the doctor's office. I bought this so there would be no more guessing about what I weight. If I gain 3 pounds, I have to take medicine. So this is a godsend.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen

customer_reviews.title: Too perfect
customer_reviews.text: This scale is extremely accurate (rats!). I am seventy-two and I assembled it myself in about twenty-five minutes; could have done it faster if I had looked at the instructions first. It is lightweight but is not flimsy; it is very sturdy. Would suggest purchasing this as a good value and for accurate weight.
customer_reviews.author: L. Rowland

customer_reviews.title: If a consistent and accurate measurement of your weight is important, this is the scale to buy.
customer_reviews.text: I got tired of using low priced digital bathroom scales which show a different weight every time you step on them none of which are ever accurate. This product is the same type of scale as doctors use and provides consistent and accurate results. I give this product my unqualified recommendation for anyone who is serious about keeping track of their weight. It’s worth the extra money.
customer_reviews.author: Norman T. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Not accurate and cheap quality.
customer_reviews.text: The scale was easy to assemble but it leaned to one side after assembly. I had to "bend" the base of the vertical neck piece to get the scale to stand up straight. Also, I measured the accuracy of the scale by using different weights and found that the scale is indicating that something is about .25 lbs heavier than it really is. But at least with this type of scale you know that it will be consistently .25 lbs off every time, unlike my other cheap digital and analog scales.
customer_reviews.author: T. Gallagher

customer_reviews.title: Pro non-digital scale
customer_reviews.text: Pro scale. I sell a lot of ebay stuff and this scale works great! It does take up a lot of room and is clunky and heavy, kind of hard to move around, but I wanted an ACCURATE scale for my body weight also and I got it! Very sturdy, easy to use and I can see reading because it's at eye level.
customer_reviews.author: ruzicka

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied, and very easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: I usually do not review items but I'm very happy with this purchase so I wanted to comment. It was incredibly simple to put together. Before i opened the package I figured it would take up my entire afternoon. From opening the box to weighing myself took less than am hour. The price was good and for what it is worth it arrived earlier than amazon had told me. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: EMaych

customer_reviews.title: Don't "weight" , buy now.
customer_reviews.text: Easy assembly.....easy calibration (very easy)....consistent readings. Identical to my doctor's scales. I loathed my ordinary "strain gauge" floor scales. I had bought several over the years and was just plain tired of getting different readings every time I weighed myself. I'm a little OCD and that made it worse. Finally I paid the money and got this set of scales. No more frustration over different readings and my OCD is now ocd. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Mark  Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product, but not heavy duty.
customer_reviews.text: Seemed a little flimsy as metal is very thin, but product works very well. I did not attach the included height measuring device. I am very satisfied with the scale overall. Far superior to the spring loaded small bathroom scales.
customer_reviews.author: RJMAN

customer_reviews.title: Great quality.
customer_reviews.text: This scale is precise and very high quality. We got tired of purchasing a new digital scale every year. They do not last long at all. This is easy to set up. I like the fact that you can measure a person's height. I would highly recommend this scale. I know we will have this for years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hoping a repair will make a difference
customer_reviews.text: The scale is the one you see in every doctors’ office. It seemed easy to assemble but we got wide swings in weight. Finally we looked underneath and found the one of five hooks that connect cables was missing. We called customer service and after a long explanation they said we could buy a replacement hook for $15. We told them that was unacceptable and they have now shipped the part at no cost. We are waiting for it to arrive and hoping we can fix it.
customer_reviews.author: Erich Almasy

customer_reviews.title: Accurate scale (a little TOO accurate)
customer_reviews.text: Oh well, I can't fool my scale any more by standing on the sweet spot. Guess I'll just have to lose weight, now, eh? This is a terrific product. Sturdy, but relatively easy to move, easy to set up and adjust. Here's one thing I noticed - there are two "S" hooks under the base of the scale, and they both have to be hooked in correctly. At some point during assembly, one of the hooks came loose and the weight results were wildly inaccurate. But once I "looked under the hood" and reconnected the "S" hooks, the scale works like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Redwing

customer_reviews.title: Great accurate scale
customer_reviews.text: I got tired of having my digital scales vary by pounds and by the surface it was on. This is like the old school doctor's office scale. It is extremely accurate and consistent.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Carroll

customer_reviews.title: American
customer_reviews.text: You can't go wrong with one of these. You'll never buy another scale as long as you live. Think about that.
customer_reviews.author: Johnnybigtime

customer_reviews.title: Good, but some drawbacks
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad product, but very touchy and platform in my opinion is very small for the average adult, especially an overweight/larger adult. Makes it difficult for them to balance steadily for a good reading. Otherwise, nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High quality scale. Would recommend to a friend.
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to assemble, and now I have an accurate measurement of my weight every day, unlike the floor scale which would put me upper down three or 4 pounds either direction depending on how it felt. Now I don't have to put up with that anymore!
customer_reviews.author: Grant

customer_reviews.title: What is this Extra Part?
customer_reviews.text: Seems well built. Pretty heavy. Balance beam is at eye-height. Height-measuring rod works well. I weighed and measured my kids and they loved it. Assembly was straightforward. Only one issue. After assembly a part fell out. There are two photos below of the extra part. Anyone know what it is? Is it left-over manufacturing scrap? The scale seems to work fine without it. -------- Update: I contacted the manufacturer, sent them a photo. It was part of the base that had worked loose in shipment and assembly. I was able to re-attach, no problem. Scale works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Charles T. Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Repeatable accuracy
customer_reviews.text: Needed a scale that had repeatable accuracy and this one passed my tests with known weights from 20lb to 250lb Pros: Repeatable Accuracy Cons: Large and heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Theodor L. Mulder

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Price
customer_reviews.text: Replaced a thirty dollar electronic scale.Kinda balked at the price at first,but I BUY AMERICAN when ever posible.Glad I do.Build quality is top notch and no more on the scale off the scale on again , so on and so on to get a simi accurate weight,I thought...... Electronic scale was Way Off !......Twenty minute assemble,needed to add a piece of plywwod to the base because my bathroom floor is wood and a bit uneven and the scale base isnt very wide.ACCURATE! What else do I need to say.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It was pretty tricky to put together
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't come fully assembled. It was pretty tricky to put together. I could never get one of the bolts threaded. It's very accurate. My parents have one too and they recommended it to me. I use it in the home.
customer_reviews.author: KatherineS

customer_reviews.title: and I am glad that I finally purchased this product
customer_reviews.text: Finally I have an accurate scale. We have gone through many cheap (and not so cheap) store scales. The readings on the cheaper scales varied by as much as 20 pounds depending on slight body shifting. This scale eliminates this. You can feel the craftsmanship and workmanship in the product. It will last a lifetime, and I am glad that I finally purchased this product. I rely on balance scales at work for accurate measurements, so why should I not have the same at home?
customer_reviews.author: Tom Xavier

customer_reviews.title: easy to assemble beast of a scale
customer_reviews.text: Large, well-made, easy to assemble beast of a scale. We thought that if we had a reliable scale it would encourage us with our weight loss, but it seems that the scale alone doesn't accomplish that. We'll keep looking for the magic gadget.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Dellar

customer_reviews.title: Parts falling out.
customer_reviews.text: These 3 parts fell out of the bottom scale. I tried to get the hook back in place as I could see where its twin is but even with needle nose pliers I was unable to place it back and the other two I have no clue. I zeroed the scales and it's off by at least 100 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: accurate scale
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly as advertised. The little things on the top that you slide to the left or right to find the weight moves very smoothly. I've used them in doc's offices that weren't this nice. You need a screwdriver, butter knife, or long sturdy fingernail to balance it to zero, and I'd prefer a little knob that I could turn. So I'd like for someone to come up with a design that makes us able to balance it to zero more easily when we move it, but that's a very minor issue. It's also just as big as the ones in the docs' offices, so find a flat spot for it before you buy.
customer_reviews.author: Wandalynette

customer_reviews.title: Best Scale Yet
customer_reviews.text: Best scale yet. There is no wondering if the battery is low or one day you are five pound heavier/lighter. No having to weigh yourself 3-5 times and take an average. The foot print is about the same as a regular floor type bathroom scale. I put it in the exact same spot in the bathroom. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Jones

customer_reviews.title: Can’t maintain calibration
customer_reviews.text: Perhaps the worst scale I’ve ever used or bought. It has to “zeroed” every day and requires a screwdriver to do that.
customer_reviews.author: DH

customer_reviews.title: HOW CAN YOU BE ON A DIET WITH A PIECE OF JUNK LIKE THAT? MY NEW SCALE COST A CONSIDERABLE AMOUNT ...
customer_reviews.text: THERE IS NO SUBSTITUTE FOR A PHYSICIAN'S SCALE!! MY OLD SCALE WAS A WEIGHT WATCHER'S SCALE AND IF YOU WERE TO GET ON IT THREE CONSECUTIVE TIMES YOU WOULD GET THREE DIFFERENT READINGS!!! HOW CAN YOU BE ON A DIET WITH A PIECE OF JUNK LIKE THAT? MY NEW SCALE COST A CONSIDERABLE AMOUNT OF MONEY BUT I NOW HAVE PIECE OF MIND.
customer_reviews.author: EDWARD CHRISTENSON

customer_reviews.title: Accurate
customer_reviews.text: Personal scale keeps accurate weight easy to read and operate sturdy and weighs past 300 pounds
customer_reviews.author: Rupert Davis

customer_reviews.title: Large and Cumbersome but accurate!
customer_reviews.text: This scale is "right on" for weight but you have to assemble it which was somewhat tricky and frustrating and calibrate it. Once that is done the weight is accurate. Three stars because it is large and cumbersome and have to find the right place for it. Mine is sitting in the laundry room. This is better for a business and not so much for home use.
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: We've had this for about 5 years now. Was easy to assemble. Has maintained its accuracy. Excellent for managing our weight!
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: great scale.
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to put together. Simple to understand instructions. Very easy to calibrate for accurate readings. The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars was because it came packaged securely but at the base of the pole where it attaches to the scale itself, it was bent some and one of the screws didn't line up properly until I bent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Justin W. Quick

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: We couldn't get the final screw to go in. The taps wouldn't line up so it was impossible to get the final screw in place. We had to use a toothpick to keep the column in balace. We went on line and asked for customer service to contact us via my husband's email and still haven't heard from them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent instructions. Usable. Not extremely stable... hard to get steady reading. Difficult to assemble unless you have done a similar model before.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne J Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Very good experience
customer_reviews.text: Arrived when promised, no product damage upon inspection, easy to assemble (minimal effort required), calibrated perfectly and double checked it with a calibrated weight. I am very pleased with the Detecto 439 Doctor Scale. I use it daily.
customer_reviews.author: Diesel Schmiecel

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy if you have tile flooring
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble but won’t level on 12 inch tile flooring. I suppose if you had the 24 inch tiles it would be fine. But spanning two tiles the feet are too cheap to stay even and causes the arm to just swing with every micro motion while trying to get the weight.
customer_reviews.author: J. Rein

customer_reviews.title: What a great product!!
customer_reviews.text: It got here early!! It was just like they said it was. Super easy to Assemble with almost no adjustment necessary. I just can't believe how accurate it is!! If you're serious about losing weight and keeping control of it and being accountable for your weight!! Then there's no better way to go, if it's good enough for the medical community it's probably better than what's at the gym. And that's the best price I saw anywhere!! $500 scale msrp.... And I got it delivered to my house for Around 150 bucks!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Lalmond

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work great
customer_reviews.text: This is great to have and a pretty good price for the product.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Scales like this is what everyone should have if you like ...
customer_reviews.text: Scales like this is what everyone should have if you like and want accuracy. Spring scales just doesn't do it. The numbers swing too much and it is not accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Big Steve of NJ

customer_reviews.title: Great Scale
customer_reviews.text: Great Scale, very stable and accurate. Was also very easy to put together. I didn't use the height bar, the instructions for that weren't exactly clear. I may take a second look, but that isn't why I bought it so I didn't factor it into my rating.
customer_reviews.author: DT

customer_reviews.title: no more guessing!
customer_reviews.text: It was so frustrating to try to get a correct weight on the digital scale. Love it when I step on the Detecto it balances at my weight and sits right there.
customer_reviews.author: acoop

customer_reviews.title: Great Scale!
customer_reviews.text: This scale is awesome. Heavy Duty, solid construction. Assembly was simple, balancing was easy as well. We have had it for over a year now and must say it holds up great and remains very accurate. Very Pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: B & K Klinko

customer_reviews.title: Great scale!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best and most consistent bathroom scale we have ever owned - we bought this second scale for our little house in the country despite its size because we are confident its readings are consistent with the original scale we use in town. It is not small or easily portable so you need a space with a hard surface floor to use and keep it.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Great Scale
customer_reviews.text: I was never too sure about the accuracy of floor scales. They seem to vary in repeated checks of my weight. Once you have the scale properly zeroed, it gives very accurate readings. Setting up the scale is easy even if a little awkward. Having a height check is a plus, especially for us senior citizens.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Ewart

customer_reviews.title: Not as sturdy as I had hoped
customer_reviews.text: Not as sturdy as I had hoped. The lower weight bar (increments of 50 lbs) has a notch at the each new increment, however, the upper level ( in quarter lbs increments) does not. Get it put together and don't move it, this will keep you from having to calibrate it often.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Crecelius

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good..... Have had it for a week. I was tired of buying and changing batteries on my digital scales that kept on giving me a different weight every time I weighted myself. But it took almost 3-4 weeks to be delivered although I have Amazon Prime (took longer than expected).
customer_reviews.author: celm

customer_reviews.title: Crush Fitness Center Approved
customer_reviews.text: I have been waiting a year to write this review, because I wanted to see how it did with a ton of use. Still looks brand new and in great shape with minimal (if any) maintenance. Just keep it clean and it will last forever. Being used at - CrushFitMKE.com
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: The perfect scale!
customer_reviews.text: This has been a wonderful scale. Extremely accurate readings and easy to use. I always had trouble seeing the tiny numbers on scales down at my feet. But this scale has the weight right at eye level and is completely balanced.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am very pleased with the accuracy of the scale
customer_reviews.text: For anyone serious about losing several pounds this is the scale to have. I was diagnosed as morbidly obese 4 years ago and have been on a weight losing food program since then to date I have lost 140# this scale was my gift to myself. I am very pleased with the accuracy of the scale.
customer_reviews.author: Rita

customer_reviews.title: I can now BELIEVE my weight, which has now ...
customer_reviews.text: I can now BELIEVE my weight, which has now stabilized due to not being able to tell myself the scale is wrong!
customer_reviews.author: Kassandra Juanebe

customer_reviews.title: Misleading  picture, didn’t get what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Misleading scale picture that shows both kilos and pound measurements. When I received the item, it’s only in pound. I contact customer service they couldn’t help me with this matter. The scale is not stable ( not heavy enough ) it moves when taking weight measurement.
customer_reviews.author: Naser Haidar

customer_reviews.title: weigh in here
customer_reviews.text: The Doctor/Physician Scale I purchase had very little assembly needed and directions made it very simple to put together. As for the delivery time from this seller, I expected to receive it between 5 and 12 days and was very pleasantly surprised to receive it within 3 working days. I would use this seller again with no hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: Joe S.

customer_reviews.title: Got it on sale and it was worth it.
customer_reviews.text: purchase it for my wife. I use it all the time. It is built well and will last my life time/ Could have had bigger or brighter numbers or I could put my glasses on:)
customer_reviews.author: Henry B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Always wanted doctors scales. Now I always know how much I weigh. No surprises at the doctors office
customer_reviews.author: Janys Jones

customer_reviews.title: Weight reads 3 1/2 pounds heavy after zero-weight calibration.
customer_reviews.text: The post does not fit firmly. Weight reads 3 1/2 pounds heavy after zero-weight calibration.
customer_reviews.author: Bob James

customer_reviews.title: Went from perfect working order to totally inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: Coming up on a year old. Went from perfect working order to totally inaccurate. Shift your weight even slightly, and the weight measurement is all over the map. It hasn't been moved since day one and it's sitting on a hard tile surface. Really frustrating. If the factory can't help, I 'm resigned to tossing it.
customer_reviews.author: NotJoeWalsh

customer_reviews.title: I love this scale
customer_reviews.text: I love this scale! I've bought three scales over the past few years, and I weigh myself everyday now. This scale is by far the best I've ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: douglas beale

customer_reviews.title: Just what the doctor ordered!
customer_reviews.text: Digital scales are all well and good, but after buying 3 of them in 10 years I decided to get a mechanical scale that had to last a long time since doctors and schools have used them since I was in school. It's wonderful. Easy to put together. I know it's accurate, and I can even know what it reads when I don't have my glasses on! If accuracy is important, I would recommend this scale to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: cjcatlover

customer_reviews.title: Winner for Us!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this and great way to really feel you are getting accurate numbers when they are important. At this stage in life it's important to keep on top of quick gains or loses of weight. Love this and it didn't take too much effort for two older people to get it put together and set up.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannine

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The best and accurate compared to the drs. scale it's right on the money..
customer_reviews.author: Michael Watkins

customer_reviews.title: Best scale I've ever bought.
customer_reviews.text: Wish I'd bought this years ago instead of wasting money on electronic scales. Accurate to within a quarter of a pound, and consistent from day to day. Doesn't have the height measurement arm that's shown, but didn't need that feature anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy H.

customer_reviews.title: Finally a consistent weigh in
customer_reviews.text: This is a great scale. I hate what I weigh but at least when I step on it the weight is consistent with the doctor's office scales. I can get off it then back on it and the weight doesn't fluctuate as with all of the other scales I have owned. Its big but I don't care.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia A Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: Professional
customer_reviews.text: It is so nice to have a scale that is right on with our weight. I hate going to the doctor and seeing that my scale was off.. a lot and thinking I weighed less! This one is just like the one you would see at the doctors and so there is no surprises.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Kirby

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Exactly what I expected. I am very pleased with it. Most of the scale was delivered pre-assembled with step by step instructions for the final setup. I was able to complete the setup alone with little difficultly; However, I used a stack of books as my 3rd hand and a pair of needle-nose pliers to connect the scale hook to the base. So, I would also recommend a second person to assist in the final connection of the pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Ree

customer_reviews.title: Everything I expected. Detecto appears to take a lot ...
customer_reviews.text: Everything I expected. Detecto appears to take a lot of pride in their US-made product. A hand signed verification of quality was in the box, and all pieces were carefully packaged to avoid damage. The scale was simple to assemble, works well, and is accurate and repeatable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Reliable and accurate
customer_reviews.text: Relible scale, wewll built. I like the hands on of a beam balance...seems more trustworthy than a digital. I have tested it with known weights and it is accurate with light and heavy weights. I gave it four stars because the increments on the beam are 1/4 pound. I would have liked something in tenths...probably have to go edigital for that.
customer_reviews.author: Bioguy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent scale, easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Finally a scale that reads weight correctly and the same all the time. Excellent scale, easy to assemble. it does help to have someone with small hands to attach the hook to the base. Very pleased with the scale.
customer_reviews.author: James A. Pettigrew

customer_reviews.title: Detco Scale
customer_reviews.text: Measures the same weight as the doctors office. Use a walker around it for my husband to step up to maintain his balance. Was not that difficult to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Lee

customer_reviews.title: No batteries needed.
customer_reviews.text: Just like what we have at the doctors' office. It was a little tricky getting the hook-rod placed in the right direction, but it works great.
customer_reviews.author: J. Loo

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I was frustrated with bathroom scales . The weight varied depending on where you place them on the floor and how you stand on them. The Detecto 437always gave the same precise weight. Solid and rugged.. Very easy to assemble. Reasonable price for this type of scale. Attractive design.
customer_reviews.author: donald silverman

customer_reviews.title: ditch the digital
customer_reviews.text: Finally an accurate scale. Okay so you have to get on the scale and slide the weights over to get your weight, as opposed to hopping on and getting a digital readout a couple seconds later. Big deal. It really is easy and no batteries to replace. I'll never go back to a digital scale and why would I have to? This scale looks like it will last for a very long time. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Johnnie

customer_reviews.title: easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as expected, easy to assemble, easy to adjust, consistent measurements. A minor glitch, a wrench was included for assembly, but a Phillips screwdriver was required.
customer_reviews.author: Woodie Lackey

customer_reviews.title: Only Scale I Will Ever Use!
customer_reviews.text: The only scale I will ever use from now on! Have gone through at least 4 digital scales and they are all crap - (get a different reading every time I step on them!) This is the bomb of accurate scales, the scale I should have bought in the first place!
customer_reviews.author: Bernard Brown

customer_reviews.title: Quality scale
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my office and the assembly was very easy. It ships almost completely assembled. You only have to put in 6 bolts. The company also had great customer service. I wrote a review on the scale for the company and mentioned that there were no instructions on how to tune the scale to assure its accuracy. I received a response email within a few hours with helpful information.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to read and very accurate
customer_reviews.text: We've had ours for a long time now in the master bathroom and use it constantly. Very easy to read and very accurate.
customer_reviews.author: ChoiceMaster

customer_reviews.title: Balance Beam Scale Just Like Docs
customer_reviews.text: Balance beam scale just like at the doctor's office! This one also comes with the attachable measure for height. Some minor assembly is needed. I love having the accuracy and precision as I work toward my weight loss goal.
customer_reviews.author: Goblinthrasher

customer_reviews.title: Detecto Balance Beam Scale Does The Job
customer_reviews.text: I need to weigh my wife accurately each day to keep track of any edema build-up since she has congestive heart failure. Good digital scales just couldn't do the job. She has a hard time standing completely still while the digital scales do their thing, and after seeing the Detecto 439 Balance Beam Scale at her doctor's office, I decided to spend the money necessary to purchase one for her. It is completely accurate to the nearest 1/4 lb. and is easy for her to stand on. Because of cost it isn't appropriate for everyone, but I am satisfied that it is just what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: westpointbob

customer_reviews.title: like it needs to be greased or oiled
customer_reviews.text: Is heavy duty and what I expected except slide mechanism isn’t smooth. Sometimes doesn’t balance out right away, like it needs to be greased or oiled. Hoping this improves with use.
customer_reviews.author: Nana W

customer_reviews.title: Buy this scale.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. The weight measures exactly the same as my VA digital scale on loan for a weight loss program. Not up or down 2/10ths of a pound, right on. Follow the instructions for easy assembly. A+ and it's a fine product made in America.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Koski

customer_reviews.title: accurate and fair price.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up. Seems to be very accurate. While electronic scales are cheaper, they give variable readings. We went to a store where they sold ordinary bathroom scales and put several on the floor. Stepping on one then another there was a 5% difference from the highest to the lowest reading. As I weigh about 170 lbs this is about 8 lbs. The difference between being perfect weight and overweight.
customer_reviews.author: Norman J. Linton

customer_reviews.title: The price was good and it gives my true weight
customer_reviews.text: The price was good and it gives my true weight, which it's very important to me as a body builder. I do have to adjust it every few days for accuracy, but is just a simple turn of a screw so no big deal. This scale should last for at least a decade which makes it worth the price. I'd recommend it to anyone who's serious about weight management.
customer_reviews.author: Kahn

customer_reviews.title: Nice scale. Made in the USA
customer_reviews.text: Nice scale. Made in the USA. Good quality and zeroed in just fine. If you are sick of electronic scales inaccuracy, and want an old-school scale like the doctor uses, this is for you.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: OK for the price
customer_reviews.text: It does what I want in a consistent manner. Overall quality and materials are not what I would expect in a professional quality instrument, but about as good as I might expect given the low price. So to summarize, the price was low, the item works, it is reasonable value for the cost, but it is not the professional quality item that was advertised.
customer_reviews.author: J.Z.Colt

product_meta.title: Detecto 439 Eye-Level Beam Scale with Height Rod
product_meta.description: Style:With Height RodDetecto's physician scale model 439 features a height rod in inches and centimeters. The platform cover is easily removed for cleaning. The die-cast beam can be easily read from either side. Detecto continues to set the pace in the clinical scale industry, backed by over a century of leadership. Detecto physician scale features a time-honored reputation for rigid construction and precision engineering. This assures an unbeatably rugged product that guarantees accuracy and durability. Detecto scales are tested with weights traceable to the U.S. Bureau of Standards. Weight Capacity 400 lbs x 4 oz. Height Rod Adjust from 30"-78". Platform measures 14-1/2" length by 10-1/2" width.
feature_bullets: The platform cover is easily removed for cleaning
The die-cast beam can be easily read from either side
Every Detecto physician scale features a time-honored reputation for rigid construction and precision engineering
Detecto scales are tested with weights traceable to the U.S. bureau of standards

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
